line1.text: Emily: Roy! There's something over there!

line2.text: Roy: Dad, it's us! We came to fin...

line6.text: Emily: He's not recognizing us...Oh no...!

line8.text: Roy: He's been here for too long. This temple...did this to him. We need to get him out!

line9.text: Emily: O-okay! Dad's been keeping track of his steps in his notes! I can navigate us out!

line1.text: Emily: Well, that's a relief! We made it!

line3.text: Jake: Is Dad going to be okay?

line7.text: John: R-Roy?! Emily, Jake? And Tank?! What are you all doing here?! And where are we? Last thing I remember...I...

line8.text: Emily: You went missing, Dad. No one could find you... The only way we were able to find this place was through the notes you left behind back home.

line10.text: John: Oh my, I was gone for that long?!

line11.text: Roy: When we found you, you didn't even recognize us...

line12.text: Emily: With all the monsters and traps, it seems like the temple was guarding some sort of dark energy.

line13.text: John: Yes, I did not intend for the temple to still be active...Such a shame, there was still so much to learn...but it's for the best. That temple should remain hidden.

line14.text: John: But I am so grateful of you kids for saving me! I'm so proud to see all of you following in your father's footsteps!

line15.text: John: I just wish your Mother was here to see this... Speaking of which, where is your mother? I thought she would be with you...

line19.text: John: Oh dear... Okay, let's get going then...quickly!
